Class ConfluenceAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.security.authentication.ExternalKenmeiApiAuthenticator<ConfluenceAuthenticationRequest>

  • public class ConfluenceAuthenticator
extends ExternalKenmeiApiAuthenticator<ConfluenceAuthenticationRequest>
    Authenticator that checks the token and logins against Confluence.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
